projects.name: Translation app
projects.description: Turn text into American Sign Language.
projects.overview: Type in text and receive corresponding ASL interpretation. React assignment during frontend training period by Noroff.
features: Receive matching presentation in hand signals

projects.name: Pokemon Trainer
projects.overview: Sort of pokedex for browsing and keeping a track of Pokemons that you've encountered. Angular assignment during frontend training period by Noroff.

projects.name: Boxinator
projects.description: Need a box? Order a box!
projects.overview: Fullstack assignment during Noroff training period. You can order mysterious boxes and you will receive email confirmations for each step. Admins are able to update details and statuses of shipments. Project was made by a group of 4 developers.
contributions: Responsibility of frontend architecture and design choices

projects.name: Movie Characters API
projects.description: API for storing movies, characters and franchises. Full CRUD functionality
projects.overview: In this project I designed and implemented database based on requirements. Fully functional API was built also. Backend assignment during Noroff training period.

projects.name: Amandus
projects.description: Robot Framework web editor and integrated git environment on the go
projects.overview: This is the software engineering project by University of Helsinki for Eficode. We continued developing existing project by adding functionalities desired by the client. You can synchronize your repositories from GitHub, GitLab and BitBucket in order to edit your Robot Framework test files on this editor. Editor is capable of all common git operations including solving merge conflicts. Project group consisted of 6 developers, each investing over 200 hours of work to this project while maintaining agile development processes.
features: Git service integration: Sync repositories with GitHub, GitLab & BitBucket
Edit, push, pull, clone, merge & create branches directly from editor
contributions: Design and implementation of new components into existing interface
Implementation of end-to-end tests with Cypress
CI/CD pipeline with GH Actions & Docker

projects.name: Rate a repository
projects.description: Browse and rate repositories on your Android phone
projects.overview: Retrieve repositories from GitHub. You can leave a review and rating for an repository, as well as, see reviews left by other users. Sign up for the app is required. This is the course exercise for FullStack Open part 10.
features: Rate, leave review & read other's reviews
contributions: End up with functional React Native Android app
